items.title_en: Sizing chaos
items.title_zh: 尺码混乱
items.summary_en: A data-driven look at sizing fairness and variability in fashion, revealing how inconsistent sizing undermines shopping experience and e-commerce design.
items.summary_zh: 以数据驱动的方式揭示时尚尺码的公平性与差异性，指出尺码不一致影响购物体验与电商设计。

items.title_en: Anthropic officially bans using subscription auth for third party use
items.title_zh: Anthropic 官方禁止第三方使用订阅认证
items.summary_en: Anthropic updates policy to bar third-party use of subscription-based authentication, impacting developers using Claude's API for paywalls or partner integrations.
items.summary_zh: Anthropic 更新政策，禁止第三方使用订阅认证，影响使用 Claude API 的开发者与合作集成。

items.title_en: AI makes you boring
items.title_zh: AI 让你变得无聊
items.summary_en: The piece argues AI can flatten creativity and make content dull, urging designers to maintain human touch or insert playful prompts.
items.summary_zh: 文章认为 AI 可能让创作变得乏味，呼吁在设计中加入人类元素或更具创意的提示。

items.title_en: Gemini 3.1 Pro
items.title_zh: Gemini 3.1 Pro（谷歌 Gemini 系列升级版）
items.summary_en: Google unveils Gemini 3.1 Pro, the latest in its Gemini AI family, focusing on improved performance, safety, and developer-friendly features for enterprise use. The update signals Google's push to close gaps with competitors and widen deployment options across apps and services.
items.summary_zh: 谷歌推出 Gemini 3.1 Pro，Gemini 系列的最新升级版，强调更高性能、更好的安全性，以及面向企业的开发者友好特性。此更新显示谷歌正力图缩小与对手的差距，并扩大在应用与服务中的落地场景。

items.title_en: Show HN: Micasa – track your house from the terminal
items.title_zh: Show HN：Micasa——在终端追踪你的房屋
items.summary_en: Micasa provides a terminal-centric way to monitor and track your home, aggregating status data from sensors and devices into a command-line dashboard. It aims at power users who want quick access without a GUI, with easy integrations and local-first design.
items.summary_zh: Micasa 提供一种以终端为中心的家庭监控方式，将传感器与设备数据聚合到命令行仪表板，面向偏好无界面的高阶用户。它强调本地优先与易于集成的设计。

items.title_en: 27-year-old Apple iBooks can connect to Wi-Fi and download official updates
items.title_zh: 27 年的 Apple iBooks 能连网并下载官方更新
items.summary_en: A curiosity piece about an old Apple iBooks model capable of connecting to Wi-Fi and receiving updates, illustrating long-tail device longevity.
items.summary_zh: 一则关于一台已存在27年的 Apple iBooks 能连接 Wi-Fi 并接收官方更新的趣闻，显示设备的长尾寿命。

items.title_en: Paged Out Issue #8 [pdf]
items.title_zh: Paged Out 第8期
items.summary_en: The latest Paged Out issue collects essays and fiction about programming culture and infrastructure, offering bite-sized takes for developers and readers who enjoy thoughtful tech writing.
items.summary_zh: 最新的 Paged Out 第8期汇集关于编程文化与基础设施的随笔与短文，适合喜欢深度科技写作的读者。

items.title_en: We're no longer attracting top talent: the brain drain killing American science
items.title_zh: 我们已无法吸引顶尖人才：人才外流正在吞噬美国科学
items.summary_en: The article argues that funding cuts, visa and talent policies are driving away top researchers, undermining US science competitiveness and innovation.
items.summary_zh: 文章指出资金削减、移民与人才政策等因素导致顶尖研究人才流失，正在削弱美国科学竞争力与创新力。

items.title_en: Pebble Production: February Update
items.title_zh: Pebble 生产：二月更新
items.summary_en: The update covers Pebble's February production milestones and software updates, giving fans a sense of hardware iteration cadence and roadmap progress.
items.summary_zh: 二月更新披露 Pebble 的生产里程碑和软件更新，展示硬件迭代节奏和路线图进展。

items.title_en: California's new bill requires DOJ-approved 3D printers that report themselves
items.title_zh: 加州新法拟要求 DOJ 核准且具自报功能的 3D 打印机
items.summary_en: California's bill would require DOJ-approved self-reporting 3D printers, raising debates over safety, regulation, and consumer freedom for makers.
items.summary_zh: 加州新法拟要求 DOJ 核准且具自报功能的 3D 打印机，涉及安全监管与对创客自由的影响。

items.title_en: America vs. Singapore: You can't save your way out of economic shocks
items.title_zh: 美 vs. 新加坡：存钱并非摆脱经济冲击的出路
items.summary_en: The piece argues macro policy differences, savings behavior, and social safety nets explain why you can't shield households from shocks by simply saving more. It emphasizes structural reforms and targeted government support.
items.summary_zh: 文章指出宏观政策、储蓄行为与社会保障不同，单靠“多存钱”无法让家庭免受经济冲击。强调结构性改革和定向政府支持的重要性。

items.title_en: Don't Trust the Salt: AI Summarization, Multilingual Safety, and LLM Guardrails
items.title_zh: 别相信盐：AI 摘要、多语言安全与大语言模型的护栏
items.summary_en: A critical take on AI summarization, multilingual safety, and guardrails, urging more robust evaluation and better guardrails to prevent breakdowns in multilingual contexts.
items.summary_zh: 对 AI 摘要、多语言安全与护栏的批判性评估，强调需要更强的评估和更完善的护栏，以应对多语言环境中的风险。

items.title_en: Mark Zuckerberg grilled on usage goals and underage users at California trial
items.title_zh: 马克·扎克伯格在加州审判中就平台目标与未成年用户接受质询
items.summary_en: Zuckerberg faced questions on platform goals and underage users during a California trial, highlighting regulatory scrutiny of social media platforms.
items.summary_zh: 扎克伯格在加州审判中就平台目标与未成年用户接受质询，凸显监管机构对社交媒体的审查。

items.title_en: A terminal weather app with ASCII animations driven by real-time weather data
items.title_zh: 一个用实时天气数据驱动的 ASCII 动画终端天气应用
items.summary_en: A terminal weather app renders real-time data with ASCII animations, turning weather feeds into an engaging CLI experience. It highlights how minimal UIs can still convey dynamic information effectively in a terminal.
items.summary_zh: 这个终端天气应用以 ASCII 动画呈现实时数据，将天气信息转化为有趣的命令行界面体验，展示了极简 UI 也能高效传达动态信息。

items.title_en: US plans online portal to bypass content bans in Europe and elsewhere
items.title_zh: 美方拟设在线门户以绕过欧洲等地的内容禁令
items.summary_en: The plan envisions a digital channel to circumvent platform bans in Europe and other regions, raising questions about jurisdiction, censorship circumvention, and the potential for policy loopholes.
items.summary_zh: 这一计划设想建立在线通道以绕过欧洲及其他地区的内容禁令，引发关于管辖权、审查规避及潜在政策漏洞的讨论。

items.title_en: Show HN: A physically-based GPU ray tracer written in Julia
items.title_zh: Show HN：用 Julia 编写的物理基础 GPU 光线追踪器
items.summary_en: A physically-based GPU ray tracer implemented in Julia demonstrates accessible high-fidelity rendering and potential for GPU-accelerated visuals in the language ecosystem.
items.summary_zh: 用 Julia 编写的物理基础的 GPU 光线追踪器展示了高保真渲染的可及性，凸显了 Julia 在 GPU 加速渲染方面的潜力。

items.title_en: AI is not a coworker, it's an exoskeleton
items.title_zh: AI 不是同事，而是外骨骼
items.summary_en: The piece argues AI should augment human capabilities as an exoskeleton, not replace workers, framing the technology as a physical augmentor that extends human productivity.
items.summary_zh: 文章将 AI 视为“外骨骼”级别的人机协作工具，用以增强人类能力、提升生产力，而非取代人类劳动。

items.title_en: How to choose between Hindley-Milner and bidirectional typing
items.title_zh: 在 Hindley-Milner 与双向类型推断之间如何取舍
items.summary_en: Practical guidance on choosing Hindley-Milner vs bidirectional typing, with trade-offs for inference, principal types, and type-checking complexity.
items.summary_zh: 给出在 Hindley-Milner 与双向类型推断之间的取舍，涵盖推断、主类型与类型检查的权衡。

items.title_en: Coding Tricks Used in the C64 Game Seawolves (2025)
items.title_zh: 2025 年 C64 游戏 Seawolves 的制作技法
items.summary_en: Technical tricks used in the 2025 C64 game Seawolves, offering retro development insights and optimization tactics.
items.summary_zh: 2025 年 C64 游戏 Seawolves 的制作技法，揭示了复古游戏开发的优化思路与技巧。

items.title_en: Bridging Elixir and Python with Oban
items.title_zh: 用 Oban 桥接 Elixir 与 Python
items.summary_en: The article discusses methods to bridge Elixir and Python via Oban, enabling cross-language background processing and job queues.
items.summary_zh: 文中介绍通过 Oban 实现 Elixir 与 Python 的桥接，支持跨语言的后台任务与作业队列。

items.title_en: Farewell, Rust for web
items.title_zh: 告别 Rust 做网页开发
items.summary_en: The author argues against using Rust for web development, suggesting alternative languages or frameworks for the web stack.
items.summary_zh: 作者认为在网页开发中不应再使用 Rust，提出用其他语言或框架来构建网络应用。

items.title_en: Voith Schneider Propeller
items.title_zh: 福伊特-施耐德螺旋桨
items.summary_en: The Voith-Schneider propeller is a cycloidal propeller designed for precise, multidirectional thrust, used in ships and submarines; the piece explains its mechanism.
items.summary_zh: Voith-Schneider 螺旋桨是一种用于船舶的轮筒式多向推力螺旋桨，文中解释其工作原理。

items.title_en: Single vaccine could protect against all coughs, colds and flus
items.title_zh: 一种疫苗或将覆盖所有咳嗽、感冒与流感的病原体
items.summary_en: Researchers describe a single vaccine concept that could provide broad protection against the common respiratory viruses causing coughs, colds, and flu, offering a potential simplification of immunization programs.
items.summary_zh: 研究提出一种单一疫苗概念，可能对导致咳嗽、感冒与流感的多种呼吸道病毒提供广泛保护，为免疫接种计划带来简化。

items.title_en: Micropayments as a reality check for news sites
items.title_zh: 微支付：新闻网站的现实检验
items.summary_en: The post argues that microdonations and micropayments are not a viable long-term revenue model for news sites, citing friction, conversion, and reader fatigue. It suggests alternative approaches like bundled access, subscriptions, and non-ad-supported models to sustain quality journalism.
items.summary_zh: 文章指出微捐赠和微支付难以成为新闻网站长期的可持续收入来源，因转化成本和读者疲劳等因素。建议采用捆绑订阅、付费墙等替代模式来维持优质新闻。

items.title_en: Show HN: Mini-Diarium - An encrypted, local, cross-platform journaling app
items.title_zh: Show HN：Mini-Diarium——一个本地加密、跨平台的日记应用
items.summary_en: Mini-Diarium is an encrypted, local, cross-platform journaling app, emphasizing privacy and offline-first design for personal records.
items.summary_zh: Mini-Diarium 是一个本地加密、跨平台的日记应用，强调隐私保护与离线优先。

items.title_en: A word processor from 1990s for Atari ST/TOS is still supported by enthusiasts
items.title_zh: 一款 1990 年代 Atari ST/TOS 的文字处理器仍由爱好者维护
items.summary_en: A vintage word processor from the 1990s for Atari ST/TOS continues to be supported by enthusiasts, highlighting active retro-computing communities.
items.summary_zh: 爱好者仍在维护一款1990年代 Atari ST/TOS 的文字处理器，展示了复古计算社区的活力与软件保护。

items.title_en: Overall, the colorectal cancer story is encouraging
items.title_zh: 结直肠癌治疗与筛查进展带来积极信号
items.summary_en: The cancer story suggests improvements in screening, treatment, or survival, signaling hopeful progress in colorectal cancer outcomes.
items.summary_zh: 结直肠癌治疗与筛查进展带来积极信号，预示相关治疗效果和生存率有望改善。

items.title_en: Dinosaur Food: 100M year old foods we still eat today (2022)
items.title_zh: 恐龙时代的食物：一亿年前的食物如今仍在我们餐桌上
items.summary_en: The piece surveys foods that date to the dinosaur era, tracing how some ancient ingredients persist in modern diets and what that implies about long-running food traditions.
items.summary_zh: 这篇文章梳理了可追溯至恐龙时代的食物，揭示某些古老食材如何延续至今的饮食传统及其背后的历史脉络。

items.title_en: Old School Visual Effects: The Cloud Tank (2010)
items.title_zh: 古典视觉特效：云罐（Cloud Tank，2010）
items.summary_en: A look at the Cloud Tank visual effects technique from 2010 and its relevance to modern VFX workflows, showing how old tricks inspire contemporary CG.
items.summary_zh: 回顾2010年的 Cloud Tank 视觉特效技术及其对当代 VFX 工作流的启发，展示旧技艺如何影响现代 CG。

items.title_en: Zero downtime migrations at petabyte scale (2024)
items.title_zh: 在 PB 级规模下实现零停机迁移（2024）
items.summary_en: Planetscale outlines strategies for online schema migrations at petabyte scale, including tooling, testing, and rollback strategies to avoid downtime.
items.summary_zh: Planetscale 分享大规模规模级的在线架构迁移策略，覆盖工具链、测试与回滚方法，确保零停机。

items.title_en: Show HN: Ghostty-based terminal with vertical tabs and notifications
items.title_zh: Show HN：基于 Ghostty 的终端，支持竖栏标签与通知
items.summary_en: Ghostty-based terminal offers a modern CLI experience with vertical tabs and in-app notifications, showcasing how lightweight, text-first interfaces can rival traditional GUI tools for power users. It demonstrates a design approach for efficient workflows in terminal environments.
items.summary_zh: 基于 Ghostty 的终端提供现代化的命令行界面，具备竖向标签和内置通知，展示了轻量文本界面如何在高强度工作流中与 GUI 工具竞争。

items.title_en: Archaeologists find possible first direct evidence of Hannibal's war elephants
items.title_zh: 考古学家发现汉尼拔战争象的可能首个直接证据
items.summary_en: New archaeology reports bone findings that may be direct evidence of Hannibal's war elephants, offering a tantalizing hint about ancient military campaigns and elephant domestication.
items.summary_zh: 最新考古发现的骨骼证据可能成为汉尼拔战争象的直接证据，为研究古代军队行动和大象驯养提供线索。

items.title_en: Measuring AI agent autonomy in practice
items.title_zh: 在实践中衡量 AI 主体代理的自主性
items.summary_en: Anthropic presents metrics and experiments for evaluating how autonomous AI agents are in practice, clarifying safety implications for real-world use.
items.summary_zh: Anthropic 提出评估AI代理自主性的指标与实验，为实际应用中的安全风险提供了量化框架。

items.title_en: ShannonMax: A Library to Optimize Emacs Keybindings with Information Theory
items.title_zh: ShannonMax：用信息论优化 Emacs 快捷键的库
items.summary_en: ShannonMax introduces a library for optimizing Emacs keybindings using information theory, offering a principled approach to customization.
items.summary_zh: ShannonMax 推出一个利用信息理论优化 Emacs 快捷键的库，为自定义提供系统化方法。

items.title_en: Minnesota judge holds federal attorney in civil contempt
items.title_zh: 明尼苏达一位联邦律师被裁定民事蔑视
items.summary_en: A Minnesota federal attorney is held in civil contempt, marking a notable courtroom development in immigration-related litigation.
items.summary_zh: 明尼苏达一位联邦律师被裁定民事蔑视，这是一起在移民相关诉讼中的重要法庭进展。

items.title_en: My 1981 adventure game is now a multimedia extravaganza
items.title_zh: 这款1981年的经典冒险游戏被重新打造为多媒体项目
items.summary_en: The retro game from 1981 is being reimagined as a multimedia project, blending classic gameplay with modern media production to reach new audiences.
items.summary_zh: 这款1981年的经典冒险游戏被重新打造为多媒体项目，将经典玩法与现代媒体融合，吸引新一代玩家。

items.title_en: A psychedelic medicine performs well against depression
items.title_zh: 一种迷幻药治疗在抑郁症治疗上呈现积极结果
items.summary_en: A psychedelic medicine demonstrates promising results against depression, signaling a potential shift in mental health treatment options.
items.summary_zh: 一种迷幻药治疗在抑郁症治疗上呈现积极结果，预示心理健康治疗可能出现新的方向。

items.title_en: Famous Signatures Through History
items.title_zh: 历史上的著名签名
items.summary_en: Take a look at historically famous signatures from rulers, authors, and innovators. The strokes, flourishes, and seals tell stories about authenticity, status, and the era's signing habits, offering quick lessons in document forensics and provenance. In a digital age, it contrasts with cryptographic signatures that aim to guarantee integrity and non-repudiation.
items.summary_zh: 这组历史著名签名覆盖了各领域的统治者、作者与创新者。笔势、花饰和印章揭示签署的真实性、地位与时代风格，提供文献鉴定和出处追溯的直观案例。相比之下，当下数字签名与密码学证明追求的是同样的可信性，但以全新机制实现。

items.title_en: University of Texas limits on teaching of "unnecessary controversial subjects"
items.title_zh: 德州大学限制教授“不必要的有争议科目”
items.summary_en: UT Regents restrict teaching of controversial subjects, raising concerns about academic freedom and curriculum scope in Texas universities.
items.summary_zh: 德州大学理事会限制教授“可能引发争议的科目”，引发对学术自由与课程范围的担忧。

items.title_en: Almost Every infrastructure decision I endorse or regret after 4 years
items.title_zh: 我在四年里几乎所有的基础设施决策的得失
items.summary_en: A startup engineer shares reflections on infrastructure decisions after four years, outlining what worked, what didn't, and practical takeaways.
items.summary_zh: 一位工程师在四年后反思几乎所有基础设施决策的得失，提供实用的经验法则。

items.title_en: Grok Exposed a Porn Performer's Legal Name and Birthdate–Without Being Asked
items.title_zh: Grok 暴露色情演员的真实姓名与出生日期——未被请求
items.summary_en: A report on doxxing a porn performer's real name and birthdate, raising ethical concerns around privacy and data protection online.
items.summary_zh: 报道讨论对色情表演者真实姓名与出生日期进行的公开号码披露事件，凸显网络隐私与数据保护的伦理问题。

items.title_en: Can random experimental choice lead to better theories?
items.title_zh: 随机实验选择能否带来更好的理论？
items.summary_en: The paper discusses whether introducing randomness into experiments can yield better theories, blending philosophy of science with experimental design.
items.summary_zh: 文章探讨将随机性引入实验是否能促成更好的理论，结合科学哲学与实验设计。

items.title_en: Level of Detail
items.title_zh: 细节层次（LOD）
items.summary_en: An exploration of level-of-detail considerations in design/graphics, discussing when to simplify versus preserve detail for clarity and performance.
items.summary_zh: 探讨在设计与图形中的细节层次，阐述何时简化、何时保留细节以兼顾清晰度与性能。

items.title_en: Palantir partnership is at heart of Anthropic, Pentagon rift
items.title_zh: Palantir 与 Anthropic 的伙伴关系在五角大楼分歧中居核心
items.summary_en: The article connects Palantir's involvement with Anthropic to tensions in the Pentagon relationship, revealing how big tech partnerships shape defense AI choices.
items.summary_zh: 报道指出 Palantir 与 Anthropic 的关系在五角大楼关系紧张中扮演核心角色，反映大型科技企业对国防 AI 选择的影响。

items.title_en: Asbestos is a bigger problem than we thought [video]
items.title_zh: 石棉问题比我们想象的更严重 [视频]
items.summary_en: A video highlights how asbestos risks may be larger than previously understood, prompting safety awareness and policy discussion.
items.summary_zh: 视频警示石棉风险可能高于以往的认知，促使人们关注安全与相关政策。

items.title_en: HUD proposes rule that would force noncitizens from public housing
items.title_zh: HUD 提出规章强制非公民在公共住房中的规定
items.summary_en: HUD proposes rules affecting noncitizens in public housing, stirring debate over immigration policy and housing access.
items.summary_zh: HUD 提出影响非公民在公共住房中的规定，引发对移民政策与住房准入的讨论。

items.title_en: The #1 most downloaded skill on OpenClaw marketplace was malware
items.title_zh: OpenClaw 市场最受欢迎的技能居然是恶意软件
items.summary_en: The top downloaded skill on the OpenClaw marketplace is malware, underscoring security concerns and the need for platform safeguards.
items.summary_zh: OpenClaw 市场最受欢迎的技能竟是恶意软件，凸显安全风险与平台监管的必要性。

items.title_en: Netbase: A port of the NetBSD utilities for Linux
items.title_zh: Netbase：将 NetBSD 的实用工具移植到 Linux
items.summary_en: Netbase ports NetBSD utilities to Linux, helping developers familiar with NetBSD tooling work on Linux environments.
items.summary_zh: Netbase 将 NetBSD 的实用工具移植到 Linux，便于熟悉 NetBSD 工具链的开发者在 Linux 上工作。

items.title_en: The Chinese periodic table goes hard [video]
items.title_zh: 中国元素周期表硬核来袭 [视频]
items.summary_en: An energetic video presenting the periodic table with bold visuals and rapid animations. It demonstrates how design and storytelling can make chemistry concepts more engaging and memorable for learners.
items.summary_zh: 一段充满冲击力的视频，使用大胆的视觉效果和快速动画来呈现元素周期表。它展示了设计与叙事如何提升化学知识的吸引力，使学习更易记忆且激发观众的科学兴趣。

items.title_en: Show HN: A small, simple music theory library in C99
items.title_zh: Show HN：一个用 C99 编写的简洁音乐理论库
items.summary_en: Compact, dependency-free C99 library that implements core music theory concepts: notes, intervals, scales, and chords. It emphasizes a small footprint and easy embedding for projects like games or demos, offering a lightweight alternative to heavier DSP or music libraries.
items.summary_zh: 这个极小、无依赖的 C99 音乐理论库实现了核心音乐理论要素，如音符、区间、音阶和和弦。旨在便于嵌入到小游戏或演示类项目，提供一个轻量的替代方案，免去对大型库的依赖。

items.title_en: Type-based alias analysis in the Toy Optimizer
items.title_zh: 该教程/博文在 Toy Optimizer 中探索基于类型的别名分析
items.summary_en: A toy optimizer explores type-based alias analysis techniques, offering insights into how language-level typing can aid optimization and memory safety.
items.summary_zh: 该教程/博文在 Toy Optimizer 中探索基于类型的别名分析，展示类型系统如何帮助优化与内存安全。

items.title_en: The Claude C Compiler: What It Reveals About the Future of Software
items.title_zh: Claude C 编译器：它揭示了软件未来的哪些趋势
items.summary_en: The Claude C compiler analysis discusses what it implies about software tooling, language design, and future compilation strategies.
items.summary_zh: 对 Claude C 编译器的分析揭示了软件工具、语言设计及未来编译策略的趋势。
